thread.title: Blood-soaked Brit, 60, is found slumped in the street after ‘fight with transgender hooker’ – as two prostitutes are hauled from hot tub in cop crackdown in Thailand’s vice capital Pattaya
thread.title_full: Blood-soaked Brit, 60, is found slumped in the street after ‘fight with transgender hooker’ – as two prostitutes are hauled from hot tub in cop crackdown in Thailand’s vice capital Pattaya

author: hchristdoloulou
title: Blood-soaked Brit, 60, is found slumped in the street after ‘fight with transgender hooker’ – as two prostitutes are hauled from hot tub in cop crackdown in Thailand’s vice capital Pattaya
text:
Opinion CARNAGE IN SIN CITY Blood-soaked Brit, 60, is found slumped in the street after ‘fight with transgender hooker’– as two prostitutes are hauled from hot tub in cop crackdown in Thailand’s vice capital Pattaya 
Police are carrying out raids across city after it was likened to a 'modern day Sodom and Gomorrah' BY HOLLY CHRISTODOULOU
